channel.title: Comments on: Dead man from the future

item.title: By: Barney Walsh
item.dc:creator: Barney Walsh
item.description: Did a couple of talks on the history of British Trade Union banners & iconography recently (a madly conflicted subject if ever) and that 'arms folded' stance cropped up. At a more antagonistic juncture, a worker depicted adopting that pose would've been code for the presence of Syndicalism, sort of Bartleby-like.
item.content:encoded: Did a couple of talks on the history of British Trade Union banners & iconography recently (a madly conflicted subject if ever) and that ‘arms folded’ stance cropped up. At a more antagonistic juncture, a worker depicted adopting that pose would’ve been code for the presence of Syndicalism, sort of Bartleby-like.
